name: Volcano Rush
description:
Richard is a tough guy but can he withstand the fires of Bell Center? 

You have to guide him to safety by balancing your voice to the right volume to stop him from tipping over and becoming EXTRA CRISPY!

A student project created by 

Benaissa Benchaa (École NAD)
Élise Beausoleil-Chartrand (École NAD)
Moufid Islem Dechicha (École NAD)
Janicki Guillaume (École NAD)
Maxime Hardy  (ETS)
Natalie Morcos (École NAD)
